Method.name: Save
Method.Implementation:
#dim couple As Couple = ""
if (..%ExistsId(data.id) = $$$YES){ set couple = ..%OpenId(data.id) } else{ set couple = ..%New() set couple.WDSFId = data.WDSFId }
set couple.Man = ##class(Person).%OpenId(data.man.id) set couple.Woman = ##class(Person).%OpenId(data.woman.id) set couple.CStatus = ##class(CoupleStatus).%OpenId(data.status.id) set couple.Division = ##class(Division).%OpenId(data.division.id) set couple.AgeGroup = ##class(AgeGroup).%OpenId(data.ageGroup.id) set couple.LastSyncWDSF = data.lastSyncWDSF
set st = couple.%Save() quit couple
